shortDescription: We're tracking {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoys that have been delivering weapons and explosives to a self-appointed warlord here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. In return, his fighters have been wreaking havoc on {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facilities in the region. We need you to interdict the convoy and destroy it.
longDescription: These are going to be lightly armored targets, Commander. The real challenge will be keeping them from making a run for it.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy and Escape
contractObjectiveList.description: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is trying to deliver contraband to a hostile faction. Destroy it.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy Guards
contractObjectiveList.description: Send a message by not only destroying the convoy, but eliminating its escorts as well.

dialogueContent.words: Commander, we need to stop those weapon convoys.
Let's move up, get eyes on the target, and intercept them.
Then we'll extract at the designated location.
The convoy is down and our job here is done. Nice work, Commander - you made that look easy.
There's nothing we can do to fix this one, Commander. I'll notify our employer that we're pulling out.
We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
The convoy guards are down, Commander! Great work.
Convoy vehicles have begun to arrive at their destination, Commander! Get on the rest and destroy them or we're done here!
One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
